alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Caldwell; Clinton; Daviess; DeKalb; Gentry; Harrison; Platte; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 10:27PM CDT until April 29 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUCHANAN...WORTH...WESTERN DAVIESS...CLINTON... GENTRY...WESTERN HARRISON...WESTERN CALDWELL...NORTHEASTERN PLATTE AND DEKALB COUNTIES... At 1027 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stanberry to near Clarksdale to Camden Point, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Bethany, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Hamilton, Gallatin, Albany, Gower, Stanberry, Maysville, King City, Grant City, Stewartsville, Trimble, Edgerton, Dearborn, Camden Point, Holt, Union Star and Osborn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 33 and 86. Interstate 29 between mile markers 25 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Buchanan; Caldwell; Clinton; Daviess; DeKalb; Gentry; Harrison; Platte; Worth
